lexUnit.name: underground.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: beneath the surface of the ground.

sentence.text: Squeeze along on your hands and knees , then wriggle flat on your stomach , and you may reach an underground cavern .
We found two underground passages , one to the sea and one to the landward side .
Leaking underground pipes and drains present another common cause of subsidence .
Community action marshalled against a deep underground car park being built beneath the cathedral square
" But before you can say it is environmentally neutral , you need to know the safety case behind the deep underground repository . "
A notice informed the public that this was the deepest Underground station in London , three hundred stairs to the bottom .
A verbal message was sent to the farm : the doctor would arrive at 1 p.m. to pick Eric up on a rough track not far from his underground hiding place .
On his way through the underground roads , he met a miner who told him of having seen heavy machinery being moved along by an unknown force .
A second time-free environment is provided by underground caves .
The Forest of Dean is riddled with underground streams and springs .
The cave itself was surprisingly warm and we realised we were walking through a gallery which led us into a lofty underground cavern .
Two sites are to be selected for the construction of underground laboratories in which tests can be carried out .
Faced with drought , the Las Vegas Valley Water District has made 146 applications for access to 26 underground basins as far as 250 miles away and as much as 1,000 feet below the surface .
Peat and water were still flowing into the underground roadways from the subsidence and attempts to block the exposed entrance to the workings were having no success .
In London he gradually took over the Underground system and came to control every line except the Metropolitan .
The basins are scattered over 20,000 square miles and fed by underground rivers which extend through Nevada , Utah and California .
The most memorable scene has German officers and their ladies trapped in an underground bunker and showered with hand grenades and gasoline .
I do not leer at the advertisements along the underground escalators .
